mapper.sql: id, uid, checker, tresult, del, ctime
mapper.insert:
insert into fc_temporarydanger_study_t
id,
uid,
checker,
tresult,
del,
ctime,

mapper.update:
update fc_temporarydanger_study_t
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
checker = #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tresult = #{tresult,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fc_temporarydanger_study_t set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, checker = #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tresult = #{tresult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from fc_temporarydanger_study_t where del = 0 and uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ctime >= date(now()) and ctime < DATE_ADD(date(now()),INTERVAL 1 DAY) order by ctime DESC

select
from fc_temporarydanger_study_t where id = (select max(id) from fc_temporarydanger_study_t)

select
from fc_temporarydanger_study_t where del = 0 and uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by ctime DESC

SELECT T1.id, T1.uid, T1.checker, T1.tresult, T1.del, T1.ctime,count(DISTINCT T1.id) FROM fc_temporarydanger_study_t T1 RIGHT JOIN fc_temporarydanger_item_t T2 ON T1.id = T2.Tdangerstudyid where T1.del = 0 and T1.uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by T1.id order by ctime DESC
